data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in North West, South Africa to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of North West, South Africa
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in North West, South Africa to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of North West.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 3,895,100 souls in North West and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Gujarati people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Gujarati people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Gujarati people is yours.
Jesus, please help the 818,766 believers in the state of North West to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, convict the 818,766 believers in North West to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.section_summary:
the state of North West, South Africa has a population of 3,895,100.

We estimate North West has 818,766 people who might know Jesus, 2,182,701 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 893,633 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in North West, South Africa and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.
